verses.verse: <WG2532> A reed <WG2563> like <WG3364> a rod <WG4464> was given <WG1325> to me. <WG3427> Someone <WG32> <WG2476> said, <WG3004> "Rise, <WG1453> and <WG2532> measure <WG3354> God <WG2316>'s temple, <WG3485> and <WG2532> the altar, <WG2379> and <WG2532> those who worship <WG4352> in <WG1722> it. <WG846>

<WG2532> Leave <WG1544> out <WG1854> the court <WG833> which is outside <WG2081> of the temple, <WG3485> and <WG2532> don't <WG3361> measure <WG3354> it, <WG846> for <WG3754> it has been given <WG1325> to the nations. <WG1484> <WG2532> They will tread the holy <WG40> city <WG4172> under foot <WG3961> for forty <WG5062> - two <WG1417> months. <WG3376>

<WG2532> I will give <WG1325> power to <WG1417> my <WG3450> two <WG1417> witnesses, <WG3144> and <WG2532> they will prophesy <WG4395> one thousand <WG5507> two hundred <WG1250> sixty <WG1835> days, <WG2250> clothed <WG4016> in sackcloth. <WG4526>"
These <WG3778> are <WG1526> the two <WG1417> olive trees <WG1636> and <WG2532> the two <WG1417> lampstands, <WG3087> standing <WG2476> before <WG1799> the Lord <WG2316> of the earth. <WG1093>

<WG2532> If <WG1487> anyone <WG5100> desires <WG2309> to harm <WG91> them, <WG846> fire <WG4442> proceeds <WG1607> out of <WG1537> their <WG846> mouth <WG4750> and <WG2532> devours <WG2719> their <WG846> enemies. <WG2190> <WG2532> If <WG1487> anyone <WG5100> desires <WG2309> to harm <WG91> them, <WG846> he <WG846> must <WG1163> be killed <WG615> in this way. <WG3779>

These <WG3778> have <WG2192> the power <WG1849> to shut <WG2808> up the sky, <WG3772> that <WG2443> it may not <WG3361> <WG99999> rain <WG1026> during <WG1722> the days <WG2250> of their <WG846> prophecy. <WG4394> <WG2532> They have <WG2192> power <WG1849> over <WG1909> the waters, <WG5204> to turn <WG4762> them <WG846> into <WG1519> blood, <WG129> and <WG2532> to strike <WG3960> the earth <WG1093> with every <WG3956> plague, <WG4127> as often <WG3740> as <WG1437> they desire. <WG2309>

<WG2532> When <WG3752> they have finished <WG5055> their <WG846> testimony, <WG3141> the beast <WG2342> that comes <WG305> up out of <WG1537> the abyss <WG12> will make <WG4160> war <WG4171> with <WG3326> them, <WG846> and <WG2532> overcome <WG3528> them, <WG846> and <WG2532> kill <WG615> them. <WG846>

<WG2532> Their <WG846> dead bodies <WG4430> will be in <WG1909> the street <WG4113> of the great <WG3173> city, <WG4172> which <WG3748> spiritually <WG4153> is called <WG2564> Sodom <WG4670> and <WG2532> Egypt, <WG125> where <WG3699> also <WG2532> their <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> was crucified. <WG4717>

<WG2532> From among <WG1537> the peoples, <WG2992> <WG2532> tribes, <WG5443> <WG2532> languages, <WG1100> and <WG2532> nations <WG1484> people will look <WG991> at their <WG846> dead bodies <WG4430> for three <WG5140> and <WG2532> a half <WG2255> days, <WG2250> and <WG2532> will <WG863> not <WG3756> allow <WG863> their <WG846> dead bodies <WG4430> to be laid <WG5087> in <WG1519> a tomb. <WG3418>

<WG2532> Those <WG3588> who dwell <WG2730> on <WG1909> the earth <WG1093> rejoice <WG5463> over <WG1909> them, <WG846> and <WG2532> they will be glad. <WG2165> <WG2532> They will give <WG3992> gifts <WG1435> to one another, <WG240> because <WG3754> these <WG3778> two <WG1417> prophets <WG4396> tormented <WG928> those <WG3588> who dwell <WG2730> on <WG1909> the earth. <WG1093>

<WG2532> After <WG3326> the three <WG5140> and <WG2532> a half <WG2255> days, <WG2250> the breath <WG4151> of <WG1537> life <WG2222> from God <WG2316> entered <WG1525> into <WG1909> them, <WG846> and <WG2532> they stood <WG2476> on <WG1909> their <WG846> feet. <WG4228> <WG2532> Great <WG3173> fear <WG5401> fell <WG4098> on <WG1909> those <WG3588> who saw <WG2334> them. <WG846>

<WG2532> I heard <WG191> a loud <WG3173> voice <WG5456> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772> saying <WG3004> to them, <WG846> "Come up <WG305> here! <WG5602>" <WG2532> They went up <WG305> into <WG1519> heaven <WG3772> in <WG1722> the cloud, <WG3507> and <WG2532> their <WG846> enemies <WG2190> saw <WG2334> them. <WG846>

<WG2532> In <WG1722> that <WG1565> day <WG5610> there <WG1096> was a great <WG3173> earthquake, <WG4578> and <WG2532> a tenth <WG1182> of the city <WG4172> fell. <WG4098> <WG2532> Seven <WG2033> thousand <WG5505> people <WG444> were killed <WG615> <WG3686> in <WG1722> the earthquake, <WG4578> and <WG2532> the rest <WG3062> were <WG1096> terrified, <WG1719> and <WG2532> gave <WG1325> glory <WG1391> to the God <WG2316> of heaven. <WG3772>
The second <WG1208> woe <WG3759> is past. <WG565> Behold, <WG2400> the third <WG5154> woe <WG3759> comes <WG2064> quickly. <WG5035>

<WG2532> The seventh <WG1442> angel <WG32> sounded, <WG4537> and <WG2532> great <WG3173> voices <WG5456> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772> followed, <WG1096> saying, <WG3004> "The kingdom <WG932> of the world <WG2889> has become <WG1096> the Kingdom of our <WG2257> Lord, <WG2962> and <WG2532> of his <WG846> Christ. <WG5547> <WG2532> He will reign <WG936> <WG1519> forever <WG165> and ever! <WG165>"

<WG2532> The twenty <WG1501> - <WG2532> four <WG5064> elders, <WG4245> who sit <WG2521> on <WG1909> their <WG846> thrones <WG2362> before <WG1799> God <WG2316>'s throne, <WG4098> fell on <WG1909> their <WG846> faces <WG4383> and <WG2532> worshiped <WG4352> God, <WG2316>

saying: <WG3004> "We give <WG2168> you <WG4671> thanks, <WG2168> Lord <WG2962> God, <WG2316> the Almighty, <WG3841> the one who is <WG5607> and <WG2532> who was; <WG2258> <WG2532> <WG99999> because <WG3754> you have taken <WG2983> your <WG4675> great <WG3173> power, <WG1411> and <WG2532> reigned. <WG936>

<WG2532> The nations <WG1484> were angry, <WG3710> and <WG2532> your <WG4675> wrath <WG3709> came, <WG2064> as <WG2532> did the time <WG2540> for the dead <WG3498> to be judged, <WG2919> and <WG2532> to give <WG1325> your <WG4675> bondservants <WG1401> the prophets, <WG4396> their reward, <WG3408> as well as <WG2532> to the saints, <WG40> and <WG2532> those <WG3588> who fear <WG5399> your <WG4675> name, <WG3686> to the small <WG3398> and <WG2532> the great; <WG3173> and <WG2532> to destroy <WG1311> those <WG3588> who destroy <WG1311> the earth. <WG1093>"

<WG2532> God <WG2316>'s temple <WG3485> that is in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772> was opened, <WG455> and <WG2532> the ark <WG2787> of the Lord <WG846>'s covenant <WG1242> <WG2532> was seen <WG3700> in <WG1722> his <WG846> temple. <WG3485> <WG2532> Lightnings, <WG796> <WG2532> sounds, <WG5456> <WG2532> thunders, <WG1027> an earthquake, <WG4578> and <WG2532> great <WG3173> hail <WG5464> followed. <WG1096>
